data.name: Implement User Authentication System
data.description: Design and develop a comprehensive user authentication system using JWT tokens. Includes user registration, login, password reset, email verification, and role-based access control with OAuth providers.

data.name: Fix Database Connection Pool Issues
data.description: Investigate and resolve critical database connection pool exhaustion issues in production. Analyze connection configuration, implement monitoring, optimize queries, and add retry logic for failures.

data.name: Create REST API for Product Management
data.description: Develop comprehensive RESTful API for product management with CRUD operations, filtering, pagination, and inventory management. Includes authentication, rate limiting, and OpenAPI documentation.

data.name: Implement Real-time Chat System
data.description: Build real-time chat system using WebSocket for customer support. Features include multiple rooms, private messaging, file sharing, typing indicators, and message history with encryption.

data.name: Upgrade Framework to Latest Version
data.description: Upgrade application framework from v3.2 to v5.1 to address security vulnerabilities. Update dependencies, refactor deprecated APIs, update configs, and ensure third-party integrations work.

data.name: Develop Mobile App Dashboard
data.description: Create responsive mobile dashboard with KPIs, analytics, and real-time data visualization. Include customizable widgets, dark/light themes, offline caching, and cross-platform compatibility.

data.name: Implement Payment Gateway Integration
data.description: Integrate multiple payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Apple Pay) with secure processing, subscriptions, refunds, and PCI DSS compliance. Support multiple currencies and tax calculations.

data.name: Optimize Database Query Performance
data.description: Analyze and optimize slow database queries using profiling tools. Implement indexing strategies, refactor complex queries, and add caching mechanisms to reduce response time by 40%.

data.name: Build Automated Testing Pipeline
data.description: Establish CI/CD testing pipeline with unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. Include security scans, code coverage metrics, and integration with Jenkins/GitHub Actions.

data.name: Implement Data Backup and Recovery System
data.description: Design automated backup system with daily backups, multi-location storage, point-in-time recovery. Include data encryption, integrity verification, and disaster recovery procedures.

data.name: Create Admin Panel Interface
data.description: Build comprehensive admin panel for system management with user management, analytics dashboard, system settings, and audit logs. Include role-based permissions and responsive design.

data.name: Implement Email Notification System
data.description: Develop email notification system with templating, scheduling, and delivery tracking. Support HTML/text formats, unsubscribe management, and integration with SendGrid/AWS SES.

data.name: Build API Rate Limiting System
data.description: Implement intelligent API rate limiting with sliding window algorithm, user-based quotas, and automatic scaling. Include monitoring dashboard and integration with existing auth system.

data.name: Fix Memory Leak in Background Services
data.description: Identify and fix memory leaks in background processing services causing server crashes. Implement proper resource cleanup, memory monitoring, and service health checks.

data.name: Create File Upload and Storage System
data.description: Build secure file upload system with virus scanning, size validation, and cloud storage integration. Support multiple file formats, thumbnail generation, and CDN distribution.

data.name: Implement Search Functionality
data.description: Develop full-text search with Elasticsearch integration, autocomplete suggestions, faceted search, and result ranking. Include search analytics and performance optimization.

data.name: Update Security Certificates
data.description: Update expiring SSL certificates across all environments and implement automated certificate renewal with Let's Encrypt. Include monitoring for certificate expiration dates.

data.name: Build Data Analytics Dashboard
data.description: Create comprehensive analytics dashboard with interactive charts, data filtering, export functionality, and scheduled reports. Integration with existing data warehouse required.

data.name: Implement Microservices Architecture
data.description: Refactor monolithic application into microservices using Docker containers. Implement service discovery, API gateway, distributed logging, and inter-service communication.

data.name: Setup Monitoring and Alerting System
data.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. Setup alerts for system metrics, application performance, and business KPIs with Slack/email notifications.
